input_info.claim: The last jedi had its world premiere in los angeles on november 30, 2015, and was released in the united states on december 15, 2017. it has grossed over $1 billion worldwide, making it the third-highest-grossing film of 2017, the 22nd-highest-grossing film of all time, and the second highest-grossing film in the star wars franchise, and received largely positive reviews. critics praised it for its plot, ensemble cast, action, effects, score, and emotional weight; some considered it the best star wars film since the empire strikes back. a sequel, provisionally titled star wars: episode ix, is scheduled for release on december 20, 2019.
